title: Learn with Pikai
description: Learn with Pikai is a completely free blockchain development course provided by Pikai Mandal.1 Learn everything about Blockchain, consensus alogorithm, EVM programming, etc.

home.title: Hi! I'm Pikai
home.description: Hello, I'm Pikai. I have been a blockchain enthusiast and a software developer for about four years. I am very passionate about cryptocurrencies and the technology behind them. A die-hard supporter of Ethereum and love to play with the technology.ðŸ™‚
